verses.roman:
mahā-pātra cali' āilā mahāprabhura sane
mleccha āsi' kaila prabhura caraṇa vandane

synonyms: mahā-pātra—the Orissan government representative; cali'-moving; āilā—went; mahāprabhura sane—with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mleccha—the governor of the other side; āsi'-coming; kaila—performed; prabhura caraṇa vandane—worshiping the lotus feet of the Lord.
translation: The mahā-pātra crossed the river with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, and when they reached the other shore, the Mohammedan governor personally received the Lord and worshiped His lotus feet.
